src:
Bek Muda Indonesia Disebut Berpotensi Berkarier di Spanyol
05 Nov 2019, 21:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Salah satu pesepakbola muda Indonesia, Syukran Arabia Samual sudah tiga tahun tergabung dalam Soccernauts, agensi pemain muda yang berbasis di Spanyol. Selama berada di Negeri Matador, pemain yang akrab disapa Arab itu sudah berlatih di beberapa klub.
Setelah beberapa tahun menimba ilmu di Spanyol, Arab dinilai memiliki bakat yang luar biasa oleh CEO Soccernauts, Ruben Hidalgo. Oleh sebab itu, pria yang juga seorang pemandu bakat ini berharap agar Arab bisa terus berada dibawah naungannya.
"Dia bersama kami selama tiga tahun, dia memulai berlatih di klub kasta ketiga Liga Spanyol, CDA Navalcarnero pada 2016. Lalu kemudian berlatih di klub La Liga, CD Leganes dan saat ini dia terlihat begitu potensial," ujar Hildago saat ditemui di Jakarta.
"Menurut saya, dia begitu pandai memainkan bola di lapangan dan dia potensial. Kita ingin lanjut kerja sama dengan dia, karena levelnya yang meningkat dia merupakan pemain masa depan yang brilian," katanya menambahkan.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Indonesian Young Defender Called Potential Career in Spain
05 Nov 2019, 21:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - One of Indonesia's young footballers, Syukran Arabia Samual has been a member of Soccernauts, a young player agency based in Spain for three years. During his stay at the State of Matador, the player who is familiarly called Arabic had trained in several clubs.
After several years studying in Spain, Arabic was considered to have extraordinary talent by the CEO of Soccernauts, Ruben Hidalgo. Therefore, this man who is also a talent guide hopes that Arabs can continue to be under his auspices.
"He was with us for three years, he started training at the Spanish League's third caste club, CDA Navalcarnero in 2016. Then he then trained at the La Liga club, CD Leganes and now he looks so potential," Hildago said when met in Jakarta.
"In my opinion, he is so good at playing football on the pitch and he has potential. We want to continue working with him, because of his increased level he is a brilliant future player," he added.

Read the next page, Bolaneters.
